author: dblevins
msg: Added the xercesImpl dep to the openejb-cxf impl since it seems to be required now.
Yanked other openejb deps from the webservice examples -- openejb-cxf should be providing all the required dependencies

author: markt
msg: Simplify instantiating parent loggers. No need to instantiate all of them all at once since Logger.getLogger() will result in a call to this method.

author: jukka
msg: TIKA-411: Generate list of supported and detected types automatically
Add supertype information to the --list-supported-types output
